Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan

Class OperatorBase

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.OperatorBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Operator
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryToUnaryOperator, DoWhileOperator, LoopOperator, OperatorAlternative, OperatorPattern, RepeatOperator, Subplan, SubplanPattern, UnarySink, UnarySource, UnaryToUnaryOperator
public abstract class OperatorBase extends Object implements Operator, Serializable
Helper class for the implementation of the Operator interface.

    • OperatorBase

      protected OperatorBase(OperatorBase that)
      Creates a plain copy of the given OperatorBase, including
      • the number of regular InputSlots (not the actual InputSlots, though)
      • the number of OutputSlots (not the actual OutputSlots, though)
      • whether broadcasts are supported
      • any specific CardinalityEstimators
      Parameters:
      that - the OperatorBase to be copied

    • OperatorBase

      public OperatorBase()

    • getCardinalityEstimator

      public CardinalityEstimator getCardinalityEstimator(int outputIndex)
      Retrieve a CardinalityEstimator tied specifically to this instance. Applicable to ElementaryOperators only.
      Parameters:
      outputIndex - for the output described by the cardinalityEstimator
      Returns:
      the CardinalityEstimator or null if none exists

      outputIndex - for the output described by the cardinalityEstimator
      cardinalityEstimator - the CardinalityEstimator
